mng: again, once more, re-, second, another, then (after sth, and not until then)

exm.mng: to be reborn, to regenerate, to be a second so-and-so (famous dead person), recycling, regeneration
one more time, again, one more, once again
once more, once again, one more time
to meet again, until we meet again, goodbye
over and over again, again and again
